tracking.title: Find Your Cargo
tracking.description: Drop your Booking number and contact method. We'll track it and send you the latest update.
tracking.bookingLabel: Enter your Booking number or Bill of lading number
tracking.contactLabel: Enter your Phone number or Email
tracking.success: Tracking request received! We'll send you an update shortly.
tracking.error: Failed to track shipment. Please try again.
